items.title: Description
items.content: Our No. 1 bestselling boot for women, Priscilla walks an elegant line between timeless classic and cowgirl chic. The vintage-inspired Tioga stitch pattern harks back to yesteryear, but Priscilla is a boot built for today. This knee-skimming, pull-on silhouette handcrafted from Maracca suede deserves the spotlight under dresses and over jeans. Handmade in Texas.

items.title: Material
items.content: Suede is made from the inside of an animal skin (whereas other leathers are the outside of the skin). It has a distinctive shaggy nap. This stead suede features a sandwich-like detail where the cutaway edges showcase a distinct vibrant color that complements the rugged nap. The beautifully rich suede colors bring playfulness while the texture adds character.labore et dolore magna aliqua.

items.title: Care
items.content: Clean: Remove loose dust and dirt with a stiff bristle brush. Condition: Apply Lucchese Leather Conditioner liberally. Protect: Apply Lucchese Premium Leather Protector.
